commit.message:
rtlanal.c (rtx_unstable_p): Use CONSTANT_P.

	* rtlanal.c (rtx_unstable_p): Use CONSTANT_P.
	(rtx_unstable_p, rtx_varies_p): Process vectors.

From-SVN: r35762

+	(rtx_unstable_p, rtx_varies_p): Process vectors.
